org.apache.lucene.search

Interface FilterCache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LRUFilterCache

    public interface FilterCache
    A cache for filters.
    See Also:
    LRUFilterCache
    WARNING: This API is experimental and might change in incompatible ways in the next release.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Filter doCache(Filter filter, FilterCachingPolicy policy)
      Return a wrapper around the provided filter that will cache DocIdSets per-segment accordingly to the given policy.

    • Method Detail

      • doCache

        Filter doCache(Filter filter,
             FilterCachingPolicy policy)
        Return a wrapper around the provided filter that will cache DocIdSets per-segment accordingly to the given policy.
